aws_ec2_client_vpn_network_association.description: Provides network associations for AWS Client VPN endpoints.

client_vpn_endpoint_id.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

subnet_id.description: The ID of the subnet to associate with the Client VPN endpoint.

id.description: The unique ID of the target network association.

security_groups.description: The IDs of the security groups applied to the target network association.

status.description: The current state of the target network association.

vpc_id.description: The ID of the VPC in which the target network (subnet) is located.
